titles.title: To limit the moratorium on certain permitting and drilling activities issued by the Secretary of the Interior, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: 7/19/2010--Introduced. Declares that a specified suspension of (moratorium on) certain offshore permitting and drilling activities on the Outer Continental Shelf shall not apply to a drill permit applicant that has complied with specified National Notices and has completed all required safety inspections. Instructs the Secretary of the Interior to make a determination on whether to issue a permit within 30 days after determining that the applicant is in compliance with such Notices and has completed such inspections.
